title.narrative: F.a: Training and supporting on growing bonsais named ?Phat Loc? for persons with disabilities in Soc Son district, Hanoi.

description.narrative: Situations and life of 20 persons with a disability in Hong Ky commune, Soc Son District, Hanoi are improved due income made from selling bonsais and these persons are empowered by the project activities.The project will train 20 people with disabilities ( physical disability and hearing impairment) in using agricultural land for planting and growing bonsais named ?Phat Loc?. After PWDs have training on growing and caring for the bonsai ?Phat Loc#, the cooperative will connect PWDs with suppliers for seed pl ants, pesticide and then deliver them for PWDs at their houses.
